name: Crystal Pop Star, Eve
effect:
[ACT](VC):[COST][Look at the top card of your deck], and you may call the top card of your deck to an open (RC).
[CONT](VC):When your unit's [Power] or [Critical] would be increased by your trigger effect, double the value of that increase.

name: Crystal Pop Star, Eve
effect:
[ACT](VC):[COST][Look at the top card of your deck], and you may call the top card of your deck to an open (RC).
[CONT](VC):When your unit's [Power] or [Critical] would be increased by your trigger effect, double the value of that increase.

name: Aurora Star, Coral
effect:
[CONT](VC):If you [Soul-Blast] a total of ④ or more this turn, the original [Critical] of all of your units with "Coral" in their card name becomes 2.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast] 2], and return a normal unit each from your (RC) and drop zone to your hand. If you returned a card with "Coral" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

name: Top Idol, Pacifica
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and activate all of the effects below according to the number of your rear-guards with "Pacifica" in their card names.
・1 or more - This unit gets [Power] +10000/drive +1 until end of turn.
・2 or more - You get two Imaginary Gift: Force.
・3 or more - Until end of turn, when your opponent would call from his or her hand to (GC), he or she must call three or more at the same time.

name: Top Idol, Riviere
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], and draw 2 cards.
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle it attacked, [COST][discard two cards from your hand], ride up to one card with "Riviere" in its card name from your hand as [Stand], and that unit gets drive -1 until end of turn. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: From Colorful Pastorale, Sonata
effect: [Melody]‐[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle it attacked a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +5000. This is shared by all of your units with [Melody].

name: From Colorful Pastorale, Canon
effect:
[Melody] (Shares all of your [Melody])

[AUTO](RC):When placed, [Soul-Charge 1]. If you have a vanguard with [Melody], until end of turn, when your opponent would call from his or her hand to (GC) for the battle this unit attacked, he or she must call two or more at the same time.

name: From Colorful Pastorale, Serena
effect:
[Melody] (Shares all of your [Melody])

[AUTO](VC/RC):When its attack hits a vanguard, if your hand has four or less cards, draw a card.

name: From Colorful Pastorale, Fina
effect:
[Melody] (Shares all of your [Melody])

[CONT](GC):If you have a vanguard with [Melody], this unit gets [Shield] +10000.

name: From Colorful Pastorale, Caro
effect:
[Melody] (Shares all of your [Melody])

[AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], search your deck for up to one card with the same card name as your grade 3 vanguard, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Silver Singer, Cutire
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, you may declare a card name other than this card's. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal the declared card or a normal unit with the same card name as a card revealed by this effect, put the declared normal unit from among them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Shiny Star, Coral
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [Soul-Charge 1]. If you have a vanguard with "Coral" in its card name, [Soul-Charge 1].
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you have a vanguard with "Coral" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Super Idol, Riviere
effect:
[ACT](Hand):If your vanguard is grade 2, [COST][ride this card], draw a card, and call two "Mermaid Idol, Riviere" from your soul to (RC).
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your vanguard with "Riviere" in its card name is placed, you may [Stand] this unit.

name: Crowning Partner, Abanne
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, put up to one face up "Top Idol, Pacifica" each from your drop zone and damage zone into your hand, and if you put from your damage zone, put the top card of your deck into your damage zone. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Pearl Sisters, Perla
effect:
[CONT]:You may only have one of this card in your deck.
[CONT](RC):All of your "Pearl Sisters, Perle" on (RC) get [Power] +20000/[Critical] +1.

name: Pearl Sisters, Perle
effect:
[CONT]:You may only have one of this card in your deck.
[CONT](RC):All of your "Pearl Sisters, Perla" on (RC) get [Power] +18000/[Critical] +1.

name: Fresh Star, Coral
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, if your soul has a card with "Coral" in its card name, draw a card, and put a card from your hand into your soul.
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [Soul-Charge 1]. If you have a vanguard with "Coral" in its card name, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Mermaid Idol, Riviere
effect:
[ACT](Hand):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Ride this card on a grade 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one card with "Riviere" in its card name from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If "Bermuda Triangle Cadet, Riviere" was [Soul-Blast] for this cost, draw a card.
[CONT](RC):If it is in the back row, this unit gets [Power] +2000.

name: Lavender Missy, Lapro
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it boosted a rear-guard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & return this unit to your hand], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Top Idol, Pacifica" from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Prominent Personality, Terminer
effect: [CONT](Hand):You may remove "this card and a card from your soul" instead of two cards from your hand for the cards removed for G assist.

name: Animated Rooting, Marijan
effect: [ACT](Hand):If your vanguard is "Top Idol, Riviere", [COST][discard this card], draw a card, and put a card from your drop zone into your soul. If a card with "Riviere" in its card name was put, return that card to your hand. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Glaring Moon, Miera
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Aurora Star, Coral", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](RC):During the battle your "Aurora Star, Coral" attacked, your opponent can only call grade 0 cards from hand.

name: Refined Poiser, Urszula
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search for up to one "Top Idol, Pacifica" from your deck or drop zone, reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.

name: Flustered Idol, Fretta
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], draw a card, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and return a "Top Idol, Pacifica" from your drop zone to your hand.

name: Scramble Red, Eilend
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard with "Riviere" in its card name is placed, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Charming Make, Piaoliang
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, if you have a vanguard with "Coral" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, when your opponent would call from hand to (GC), he or she must call two or more at the same time.

name: Riddle Mysteria, Luvene
effect:
[CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +2000 for each face down card in your damage zone.
[AUTO](RC):When its attack hits a vanguard, if all of the cards in your damage zone are face down, [Soul-Blast 2 any number of times, and [Counter-Charge 1] for each time.

name: Electro Techno, Thiko
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put this unit into your soul], and one of your units with "Coral" in its card name gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

name: Topping Mascot, Serio
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Top Idol, Pacifica" and a "Refined Poiser, Urszula" each from among them and put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If your and your opponent's vanguard are grade 1, you may pay "[Soul-Blast 1]" for this cost.

name: Mini Mini Sparkle, Parum
effect: [CONT](RC):If you [Soul-Blast] a total of ② or more this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Loftiest Pier, Evge
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard with "Riviere" in its card name is placed, if you have one or less face up cards in your damage zone, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Intact Parasol, Enis
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Bubble Dream, Perisia
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], draw a card, and if you discarded a grade 4 for this cost, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Trouble Varidol, Pressiv
effect:
[CONT]:You may have up to sixteen of this card in your deck.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks or is attacked, reveal any number of "Trouble Varidol, Pressiv" from your hand, and this unit gets [Power] +1000 until end of that battle for each card revealed.

name: Fleeting Memoria, Aktiana
effect:
[CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +3000 for each of your vanguard's grades.
[AUTO](RC):At the beginning of your ride phase, retire this unit.

name: Charging Ache, Metre
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], draw a card, and one of your units gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Tide Conductor, Ekhos
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your vanguard is placed, you may have this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If that vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], and draw two cards.

name: Affable Wash, Thecla
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][reveal a grade 4 from your hand], put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order, draw the same number of cards as the number of cards put, and shuffle your deck.

name: Silent Ardor, Solda
effect: [CONT](RC):All of your rear-guards with the same card name as your vanguard get "Boost", and cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.

name: Angelic Star, Coral
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

name: Bermuda Triangle Cadet, Riviere
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

name: Pure Gifter, Aliche
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

name: Handmade Lover, Elena
effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)
